mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car(car_code, car_name, type, fuel_type, authority, buy_at, memo, created_at, status) VALUES (#{car_code}, #{car_name}, #{type}, #{fuel_type}, #{authority}, LOCALTIMESTAMP, #{memo}, LOCALTIMESTAMP, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT c1.car_code, c1.car_name, o.created_at, c2.accum_mileage, c1.memo FROM car c1 LEFT JOIN car_detail c2 ON c1.car_code = c2.car_code LEFT JOIN operation o ON o.car_code = c1.car_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT car_code, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM operation GROUP BY car_code) latest_operation ON o.car_code = latest_operation.car_code AND o.created_at = latest_operation.max_created_at
